description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Snake is Back! SGLII Bug Blast featuring brand new levels, power ups, enemies and whole host of improvements! Have you got what it takes to be Top Snaker?
